intro: The dust settles. The game state changes. Update the decks and prepare for what comes next.

genrePoint.title: Genre Point Checkpoint
genrePoint.body: Did a player play into a trope, make a great roleplay choice, or terrify the table?
genrePoint.caption: Tokens on Table: {table} | Tokens Held: {player}

success.title: SUCCESS
success.caption: The character manages to accomplish their goal.

victory.title: Victory
victory.body: The Red Joker is defeated. You have survived the night.
victory.caption: Proceed to see your final score.

defeat.title: The End
defeat.shuffle: Shuffle the Red Joker back into the Threat Deck.

remove.title: One Last Chance
remove.body: Remove the Black Joker from the game.

success.title: A Small Victory
success.body: Remove the highest Face Card from the Threat Deck.

failure.title: The Horror Grows
failure.body: Add a random King to the Threat Deck.

trophy.title: Update Trophy Pile
trophy.body: Move the {card} to the top of the Trophy Pile.
trophy.caption: This becomes the new Base Difficulty for the next Face Card the characters face.

reserve.title: Add Reserve
reserve.body: Take the next card from the Number Reserve and add it to the bottom of the Threat Deck.

found.title: Weakness Found!
found.caption: This is the first time you've defeated a {suit} Face Card.
found.action: Remove this card from the game.

known.title: Weakness Already Known
known.caption: You have already found the weakness for {suit}.
known.action: Shuffle this card back into the physical Threat Deck.

retaliate.title: The Killer Retaliates
retaliate.add: Add a random {rank} to the Threat Deck.
retaliate.empty: No Face Cards left in reserve!

remains.title: The Threat Remains
remains.body: Shuffle the entire Threat Deck and Trophy Pile.
